DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate prevalence pre-diabetes diabetes among Air Force personnel pass Air Force physical fitness test ( AFPT ) evaluate usefulness AFPT prescreening tool disease process .
DOC.brief_title: A1c FIT TEST : An Epidemiological Study Correlating Hemoglobin A1c With Results Air Force Physical FITness TEST .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Tricare Insurance Beneficiary ( military insurance ) receive care Nellis AFB Over age 18 take AFPT within past 1 month . Exclusion : Previous diagnosis diabetes Pregnant nursing
